item.description:
Do you love sushi as much as we do? If so - you're in luck! Join us at a private sushi and sake tasting at Haru Sushi.

Haru is a modern Japanese restaurant group known for its ample portions and striking designs. Haru serves inventive Japanese cuisine ranging from sushi, sashimi and creative salads to signature dishes like carpaccios, ceviches, tartares, filet mignon, grilled spicy shrimp and specialty rolls.

Your sushi experience at Haru will include a four course meal and a flight of sake that accompanies each course. It will feature a little bit of everything; sushi, sashimi, ceviche and some specialty rolls.

If you are a true sushi lover - this experience is not to be missed!

Space is limited to 20 people - go to www.thingstodoboston.com to reserve your spot today!

Suggested Attire: Business Casual

Directions: Haru is located on the street level below the Shops at the Prudential Center.

If you're taking the T - take the Green line to the Prudential stop (E line.)

You could also get off at Copley or Back Bay.
item.name: Sushi & Sake Tasting at Haru Sushi
